actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spy makes two Shortsword or Hand Crossbow attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Cunning Action
bonus_actions.desc: The spy takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

bonus_actions.name: Feint (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The spy makes a feint at one creature within 5 feet of it, pretending to go in for an attack in one direction only to change it up at the last moment. The target must succeed on a DC 13 WIS save or the spy has advantage on the next attack roll it makes against the target.
